segments.text: I notice the overflowing sink, water cascading onto the cabinet below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels a bit chaotic, almost like the scene is screaming for attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on polishing that plate; she’s oblivious to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel frustrated that she can’t see the mess forming at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there’s the boy, climbing that wobbly stool with such reckless abandon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout for him to be careful, but my voice catches in my throat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a recipe for disaster, and the girl is just standing there, waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her arm raised in anticipation, innocent in her eagerness for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks so peaceful, a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can only hope someone notices before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
